text_paragraphs: Information Note on the Court’s case-law 16
The case concerns the length of civil proceedings instituted by the applicant in July 1994 and still pending before the Supreme Court in November 1999 (5 years and 4 months).
Article 41: The Court awarded the applicant 2,500 Cypriot pounds (CYP) in respect of non-pecuniary damage. It also made an award in respect of costs.

This summary by the Registry does not bind the Court.
